Uses of Interface
com.joliciel.talismane.posTagger.features.PosTaggerRule

  • Packages that use PosTaggerRule 
    Package Description
    com.joliciel.talismane
    Entry-point package for Talismane - for simple usage code samples, see the com.joliciel.talismane.examples package.
    com.joliciel.talismane.posTagger
    Package enabling the part-of-speech tagging of a TokenSequence.
    The central class is the (PosTagger).
    It tags based on a previously constructed classificaton model, converting the model's outcomes to PosTag using the currently set PosTagSet.
    The PosTagSet is set via TalismaneSession.setPosTagSet(PosTagSet).
    The pos-tagger prodces a PosTagSequence which is a list of PosTaggedToken.
    It can be evaluated via a PosTaggerEvaluator.
    com.joliciel.talismane.posTagger.features
    Various features specific to the pos-tagging phase.

      List<PosTaggerRule> TalismaneConfig.getPosTaggerRules()
      The rules to apply when running the pos-tagger.

    • Uses of PosTaggerRule in com.joliciel.talismane.posTagger

      Methods in com.joliciel.talismane.posTagger that return types with arguments of type PosTaggerRule 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      List<PosTaggerRule> PosTagger.getPosTaggerRules()
      Rules to be applied during pos-tagging, used to override the statistical model for phenomena under-represented in the training corpus.
